page.title: 10Kyle&Carrick Civic Society.
page.content: The Society was founded in 1967 to aid{preservation, development and im_ {provement}of features of public amen_ ity. We have succeeded in having Victor_ ian facades retained in Ayr streets where{redevelopment}has taken place. We draw on the professional expert_ ise of our 150 members to make con_ structive comment on proposed new buildings and to identify old features worthy of preservation. We monitor the{district planning register}to identify proposals of interest and this year commented on many features of the{five year plan for land use presented by the Council. We have funded a project to renew the garden at{15th century Loudoun Hall}and annually run a schools competition to encourage children to extend their awareness of their surroundings.
